The Government of Canada shall not be held liable for any third party’s interpretation of the Information. The Government of Canada reserves the right to change or revise the Information at any time.

mapctrl.crosshair: Use Arrows, + and - keys to navigate the map, Enter to select and Shift+Arrow Up or Down to modify the pan value.

legend.title: Legend
legend.noLayersAdded: No layers added to the map
